remarks: In an ordered ring, multiplication with a positive does not change strict comparison.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 9-Apr-2018.)
statement:
ornglmullt.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
ornglmullt.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
ornglmullt.0 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
ornglmullt.1 $e |- ( ph -> R e. oRing ) $.
ornglmullt.2 $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
ornglmullt.3 $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
ornglmullt.4 $e |- ( ph -> Z e. B ) $.
ornglmullt.l $e |- .< = ( lt ` R ) $.
ornglmullt.d $e |- ( ph -> R e. DivRing ) $.
ornglmullt.5 $e |- ( ph -> X .< Y ) $.
ornglmullt.6 $e |- ( ph -> .0. .< Z ) $.
ornglmullt $p |- ( ph -> ( Z .x. X ) .< ( Z .x. Y ) ) $.
